name: Todo list mobile app
description: A mobile todo list app using a react native framework with a sqlite database.

name: Todo list web app
description: A fullstack todo list web app using a express tech stack with mongodb for the backend, and a custom designed front end.

name: T.A.P Roblox plugin
description: A Roblox plugin that changes terrain material based on angle. Has a fully customizable rule set and support for a user set seed for randomizer.

name: proximity prompt v2 (roblox utility)
description: A graphical solution to modify proximity prompts in Roblox. Supports being a drop-in replacement, graphical modifiable,and modeler to be fully customized

name: FRC 2020 Team 4270
description: All the code from the 2020 frc robotics game Infinite Recharge. The software I developed to mix autonomous and manual control won the innovation in control award for the FRC Canada-Pacific reginal competition that year.
